description: Try our easy to follow Summer BBQ Plant-Based V2burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Summer BBQ Plant-Based V2burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 seeded brioche buns, sliced in half, toasted
4 slices Swiss or American cheese slices (optional)
Always Fresh cucumbers dill, sliced (to serve)
1 red onion, sliced thinly, separated into rings

recipeInstructions.text: Season your v2burger patty with sea salt and grill on both sides, about two minutes per side. Brush the patties with butter and top with a slice of cheese while still hot so the cheese melts (both optional - or use a dairy free alternative!)
Remove the patties from the grill and stack with your favourites! We went for mustard, pickles, sliced onion, sliced tomato, oak lettuce and aioli on a lightly toasted brioche bun.
